sentences.sContent: It's an environment that is at once trashy and highly exacting: every hangnail a sin, every eye-bag a crime.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's an environment that is at once trashy and highly exacting: every hangnail a sin, every eye-bag a crime.
sentences.sCn: 环境就是这样的严格：每个手指倒刺都是过失，每个眼袋都是罪恶。

trans.tranCn: 手指头的倒拉刺（指甲旁的逆刺皮）
trans.tranOther: a piece of skin that has become loose near the bottom of your fingernail
